content.rendered:
Smart NFT comes with all the necessary pages within it. here is the important pages and settings overview below

All NFT page and NFT list:

Shows all NFTs minted on the current active smart contract’s network. This page has a filter on different things. You can customize this page from the settings panel. You will also get all NFT lists in the backend.

Smart Contracts:

You can view, activate, and delete currently deployed smart contracts from the smart contracts page on the backend. It’s for only site administrators who want to create an NFT marketplace. You can choose various blockchain networks to deploy your contract.

Public Profile:

On the public profile, you can get all details about the owners of the NFTs’. You can also get his wallet address and social profiles and links. All NFTs owned by him will also show here.

Profile Edit Page:

Here users can add profile information, upload a profile picture, or add a cover photo. You need to connect a Metamask to edit your public profile.

Create new:

Here people can create NFT from the frontend easily with ease by only connecting to Metamask without login. Its a elemntor add on and you need elementor installed and active to add this page element.

Settings:

Here from WordPress backend you can customize your site / frontend effectively.
